document_data.name: Karolina Wormack
document_data.mainbody: '''Karolina Wormack''' was a woman in the late 15th century.
document_data.History: In [[1484 DR]], during the [[orc]] and [[drow]] next assault on the [[Silver Marches]], Karolina lived with her brother [[Giles Wormack]] in [[Sundabar]]. They assisted in a speech made by knight-commander [[Aleina Brightlance]] just before the fall of the city.
